title: Dissenchanting Hero Shards
body: I keep trying to disenchant hero shards and the system keeps crashing on me. It will briefly show up with a disconnected window asking me to reconnect/exit. Followed up with disenchant failed window. I've reinstalled and ran the client repair in the settings with no progress. Can someone please help me out?

replies.body: Getting that disconnected window kind of makes it sound like your network is losing its link with our servers causing the loot functions to mess up. Do me a favor and try adjusting some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure there aren't any firewalls getting in the way. You might have an easier time with an ethernet connection too!
